text: whoever said size doesn't matter never
saw this table
is that an insult or a compliment
knowing you charles you'll take it as
both

through the vents
you told your secretary i was george
clooney's brother she said it was
obvious who got the looks in the family
great do me a favor tell her she's fired
on the way out
can do but first i wanted to show you
these
you want to give me the aston martin
give is a strong word
you want me to buy you out you're going
to buy me out
so i come to me instead of mike ross
because i put him and logan sanders in a
room together
and those two [ __ ] let their
personal [ __ ] get in the way of business
that's what makes you think these two
[ __ ] gonna do any better
because as much as you hate my guts you
want this deal and that car as much as i
do
army taking your car is tempting but
i don't think buying you out makes sense
anymore what else
because you're standing there asking me
to do it
now walk your sorry ass out of my office
okay charles but i'm afraid you're
forcing me to
use my leverage on you you don't have
[ __ ] on me pal who do you think
bought that wexler block three days ago
i don't give a [ __ ] who bought it three
days ago
because it just went back on the market
30 minutes ago and you're looking at the
man who owns it now

forestman bought the wechsler shares
what they went back in the market and he
snatched him right up
holy [ __ ] we win
we do you do
it's not over yet i want you to draw a

i've been thinking about forsman and
you know we wouldn't have been able to

think about what else we could do with
him
you want to team up with him well
you don't need to convince me but how
the hell are you going to convince him
by giving him a discount on this deal
how much of a discount
thinking somewhere in the neighborhood
of
a hundred percent
god damn it louis what the hell did you
do what are you talking about i just
came from a meeting with charles forsman
and when i reached for my bargaining
chips he told me i didn't own them
anymore because you unwound the wechsler
sale
i was trying to save the firm from
exposure and who the hell told you to do
that
jessica did she told you the goddamn
weight and you know it check your phone
i tried calling you
i left three messages i don't care if
you left me a million messages
you were told to wait for my approval
and you didn't listen because you're
never goddamn do
you know what harvey i always listen i
always play the good soldier and what do
i get for it
nothing i may not be a name partner but
i am a senior partner you get it
i couldn't reach you and i made a
goddamn judgment call
you want to know why you're not a name
partner lewis because every judgment
call you make turns to [ __ ]
well then what do you want harvey
i'll do anything to make up for it you
want to do something lewis
instead of using donna to give me some
stupid goddamn mug
stay the hell out of my business
you might grab me a couple of packs of
sugar there i don't work here

if you're not here to give me something

let me buy you out
listen [ __ ] harvey came by last night
tried to make a deal
i told him to shove it up his ass
don't think i don't know good cop bad
cop when i see it good cop bad cop
doesn't work when one of them hates the
other one
and what the hell is this your niece's
diary
it's a time capsule of my rage
april 22 2009 harvey told me to file a
motion to dismiss the odor emanating
from my armpits
this is a joke once again he picked my
biggest fear and put it on display for
the entire world to see
oh yeah i can go on he ate you that bad
huh
no doesn't give a [ __ ] about me at all i
hate him that bad
you know you don't have the authority to

behind his back and i got it i
see i agree to this ucla's client and
he'll have lost to me
which is far more humiliating than
